review: **** ******* Understood the case and did a thorough check up. Didn't suggest any tests because it was not needed. ******* * **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Raghwan is an expert in his field with years of experience. He responds to our querries, very friendly nature and available all the time. I recommend him for all kind of problems to your baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Doctor listened to the details about the issue along with history, examined the kid and prescribed medicine. Spends enough time, may be I was the 1st person and 1st time but gave enough time to us.
Also limited the medicines and didn't prescribe too many of them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are checking with Dr. Ragavan for past 5 years, he is good and treatment is good. My friend circle also checking with him only. 

Highly recommended for children's with fever, cough, cold, dysentery, stomach pain, digestion, health, diet.

Good Experienced Doctor.
